description:
Shigeshige makes his intentions clear in the face of Nobunobu`s appointment as shogun. Meanwhile, the full aftermath of the battle finally comes to light...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 8: Adieu, mes potes
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Eight: Farewell, Buddy
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Hachi: Saraba Dachikou
将軍暗殺篇八 さらばダチ公
